name: PhysicalDefect
description:
故障机器人是我在杀戮尖塔中第四喜欢的角色，但是球牌卡我物理机听牌和启动了，为了修复这一问题我新添加了一个角色，一个卡池中去除了大量球牌（除等离子球外）的物理机。 新增负集中散射机制：拥有 N 点负集中时，你的单体攻击牌将被拆分为 N 段随机伤害。每段攻击仅造成 1/N 的基础伤害，但能完整享受力量加成。可以在模组界面选择开关此机制 
The Defect is my 4th favorite character in Slay the Spire. However, Orb cards often clutter the deck, hindering the setup and startup of Physical builds. To fix this, I created a new character: a Physical Defect with most Orb cards removed from the card pool (except for Plasma). Negative Focus Scattering: With N Negative Focus, your single-target Attacks are split into N random hits. Each hit deals 1/N base damage but applies full Strength. (Can be toggled in the config menu)
